sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {Routes, Route, Navigate, BrowserRouter} from 'react-router-dom'
import {ListLinksPage} from "./pages/ListLinksPage"
import {CreateLinkPage} from "./pages/CreateLinkPage"
import {DetailsLinkPage} from "./pages/DetailsLinkPage"
import {Authpage} from "./pages/Authpage"

export const useRoutes = isAuthenticated => {
    if (isAuthenticated) {
        return(
            <BrowserRouter>
                <Routes>
                    <Route exact  path="/links" element={<ListLinksPage />}/>
                    <Route exact  path="/create" element={<CreateLinkPage />}/>
                    <Route exact  path="/detail/:id" element={<DetailsLinkPage />}/>
                </Routes>
                <Navigate to="/create"/>
            </BrowserRouter>
        )
    }

    return(
        <BrowserRouter>
            <Routes>
                <Route exact  path="/" element={<Authpage />}/>
            </Routes>
            <Navigate  to="/"/>
        </BrowserRouter>

    )
}
